example.eg: Please complete the attached form and return it to us in the envelope provided.
example.egtrans: 请把附在后面的表格填好，然后用我们提供的信封寄回。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 附在上面的, 订在一起的

example.eg: After I read an email, I look below the text to see if there are any attached documents.
example.egtrans: 读完邮件后，我检查了文本下方，确认有无附件。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 附件的, 附寄的

example.eg: My daughter is very attached to her stuffed bear.
example.egtrans: 我女儿很喜欢她的毛绒熊。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 喜欢…的

example.eg: The house has an attached garage.
example.egtrans: 这栋住宅配置了连体车库。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 联排式的

dsense.name: attached
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (having a boy- or girlfriend)

example.eg: Are you attached? Or are you looking for a relationship?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有对象的，有男朋友或女朋友的

dsense.name: attached to [sth]
dsense.guideword: military (military: assigned to a unit) (军事)

example.eg: The sergeant is an advisor, attached to a foreign military unit.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 归属的，附属的，隶属于的

example.eg: The seamstress attached the buttons as the last step in mending the dress.
example.egtrans: 作为修补裙子的最后一步，女裁缝缝上了纽扣。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 附加, 加上

example.eg: The children attached hooks to the ornaments before placing them on the Christmas tree.
example.egtrans: 孩子们给饰品系上挂钩后，把它们挂到圣诞树上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...系在...上，把...拴在...上，给…系上

example.eg: Jamie attached a note for her son's teacher to his sleeve so he would not forget.
example.egtrans: 杰米把给儿子老师的字条绑在了儿子的袖口，这样他就不会忘了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...紧紧绑在...上, 把...固定在...在

example.eg: When Tina sent the email, did she attach the photos?
example.egtrans: 蒂娜发邮件的时候，附上照片了么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 附寄, 附加

example.eg: The hacker had attached a computer virus to the email.
example.egtrans: 黑客将电脑病毒附带进这封邮件里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...附带进...里, 随...附上

example.eg: A carabiner attaches to your belt or bag strap so that you can easily carry keys, a water bottle or other equipment.
example.egtrans: 你可以在腰带或者背包带上挂一个铁钩，方便携带钥匙、水壶或其他装备。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 系上, 挂上, 缚上

example.eg: Dave attached himself to our group in the first week of college, but none of us really like him.
example.egtrans: 大学第一周，大卫一直缠着我们的小组，但我们中没有人喜欢他。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 依恋，依赖, 缠着...不放

example.eg: Will attached himself to the new business venture.
example.egtrans: 威尔自己也参加了这场全新的商业冒险。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 参加，参与, 加入, 成为...的一份子

example.eg: The judge decided to attach a percentage of his salary for unpaid child support.
example.egtrans: 法官决定扣押他工资的一定百分比，偿付拖欠的子女抚养费。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扣押

example.eg: The appraiser attached a value of $5,000 to the old grandfather clock.
example.egtrans: 鉴定师对那座老式的落地钟的估价为5000美元。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...归于, 把...归属于

example.eg: They attached Melinda as a security officer for the department.
example.egtrans: 他们指派梅琳达为该部门的安全长官。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 指派…为, 任命…为

example.eg: The sergeant attached Rick to a special ops unit.
example.egtrans: 队长将里克调配到一支特别行动组。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…调配到， 将…配属给

dsense.name: attached document
dsense.guideword: ([sth] appended to letter or e-mail) (信、邮件里的)

example.eg: Please read and sign the attached document.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 附属资料, 随附文件

example.eg: At first I didn't like him, but I've since become really attached to that dog.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 依恋, 恋慕

example.eg: I will give you my old coat, no strings attached.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无附加条件, 无附带限制

example.eg: Please find attached a check for $25 for the application fee.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 请见附件，随信附上
